content: In terms of story and mechanics, Valkyrie Profile is a classic that stands the test of time. It's an excellent experience through and through. I only have one minor aggravation with this version: the inability to tweak or enhance visual performance. Personally, I'd be willing to sacrifice battery life for a less pixelated presentation and smoother FPS.

I bought the game long time ago to casually play whenever I had no internet, making sure to load the game once a month to keep the authentication token. Recently, I tried to boot up the game, I am given a constant notification of Error Code: 19, and refuse to allow me to load and play the game. The game is completely broken.
I loved this on my PSP when I was younger - never managed to complete it back then, so that's what i'll do now!
Only issue are the controls and needing to switch from a controller for platform vs screen for rpg. Still a 5 star game.

Square deserves a tongue lashing from Freya. I am not a good game player, but I could get through this on my old PSP(s), without help. It was fun. There was something about it...corny, droll and little hokey - but fun. It was fun discovering "hard mode" was a completely different game..and easier to play than "normal mode". Not on my 14 inch chromebook. If you attempt this: CrimeInPartner's youtube videos might save your sanity...maybe? I still love it.
Update your game plz

Have a controller, controls are mediocre. Partial control. Didnt try touchscreen as I had it playing on a bigger screen. Bought cause I saw controller support and want to play on a big screen... unlike The last remnant. (No controller support what so ever) I do not understand porting things to phones and taking away the ability to use a controller from games originally played with a controller. Barely got into the game. Can't give it a honest review. Square Enix...why do you do this?
I love this game back on the psp glad i can take the game with me anywhere on my phone ðŸ˜ŠðŸ’™

Phenomenal franchise that unfortunately was descontinued for various reasons despite critically postive reception (for the most part)... The only legitimate issue present here are the controls, otherwise it's performance is perfect. I can only hope Silmeria makes its way here too since it's apparently locked to the PlayStation 2.
Just as good as the original!
Nice
Platforming controls make this impossible to play
Nostalgia.
Great game hands down must play for any 90's rpger out there

please fix your game, its always kicked me out,and pls adjust the controller,sometime hard to use that.fix it,tq yeah played over than 100hours nowit is ,so nice.chapter 8.please sell auto battle x2 for faster action,tq dear
A trip down memory lane of one of my favorite jrpg from ps1. Control are a bit hard to get used to but once you get it, it's as fun as I remember it.

Really nice to see this game in amazing graphics thankyou. The biggest issue with this game is the analog touch screen control! It isn't great!! Please update and have the option to turn on a constant touch D-pad which stays on screen like most emulators. Would solve the problem completely and I will then rate 5 ðŸŒŸ
One of the true classic epic RPGs that I TOTALLY missed out on for over 2 decades.ðŸ˜­ðŸ’–
A few minor hiccups here and there, but solid. I can see why it's a classic, one I'm sad I never played back when I had a PS1

Works as well as I hoped it would but the controls are difficult at times. Yeah... the controls are my only problem here. Jumping from one platform to another is a pain but you get used to it. Great game nonetheless

Oh boy, this is one I've been thinking long about since I saw this pop up on the store. I was hoping for a remake, I was fearing a reimagination, and what we got was a nostalgia trip. -Good- The story and graphics are true to the original PS1 version, with the added cutscenes in the PSP remake. The game feels like a nice trip down a on old road I loved. -Bad- Oh boy, the controls are... wonky at their best. They do take some getting used to, and some of the hard only dungeons are made tougher.
Smooth game play, beautiful animations...finding lost souls and maiing them warriors is a great storyline.

Horrifying. Utterly horrifying. This was one of my favorite PSP games, but this port handles terribly. The controls are an absolute mess. I finally got around to using a PS4 controller to bluetooth with my phone, but the controls are STILL an absolute mess. I've got the Valkyrie on a shoulder button, and Jelanda is controlled by the button on the wrong side. Neither control scheme works. The inputs are really laggy, and I have next to no control. Absolutely unplayable. FIX THIS YOU MORONS.
Please bring all the classics to mobile. Xenogears saga frontier and legends of lagaia
Dont like time limits in RPGs, good game but having time pass by everytime you visit a town isn't great.

For all the people complaining about the controls: you can use an Xbox One or PS4 controller via Bluetooth and it works just fine :) Great game! Can't wait to actually finish it out, now that I finally have a phone that supports it! Will edit this review with details on Galaxy S10+ performance when I have more to say. Thank you Square for bringing this game to android and for the great sale price! Now if only we could get these prices more often, I would have a much larger Square-Enix collection
The game is good, plus save everywhere is the best, but soft pad control is make stage puzzle too difficult (I play with ps4 ðŸŽ® controler sometime ðŸ¤¨)
Great game brings back memories

This is simply a poor way to play one of the best classic JRPGs of all time. Square put a lot of time into creating new, usually very eye-catching menus for this port, and of course Tri-Ace's spritework is at the top of their craft, but some of the platforming is way too imprecise with touch controls. This coming from the first dungeon, I can't even fathom how some later, more difficult platforming challenges will play out. It's a shame this is the only modern port of such a masterpiece.
Memories..
Same old great game, but the mobile port controls are terrible. While a lot of the navigation requires combining movement with other skills, the port doesn't seem to accept multiple inputs at once.
Great game very very fun

It is valkyrie profile lenneth alright. But i'm sure the control could be better, and the pay to "cheat" system just make it worse, you still can play without it. I'd still recommend it tho, if you havent play valkrie profile. Just need time to adjust with the control
best game but the touchscreen controls are awful
Controls are horrible, waste of money.
Wont launch pass the title screen

Classic re-start of a playstation gem turned psp remake, turned mobile remake! I don't really have an issue with the touch platforming aspects and do not need the gamepad support, not yet at least. I never gave this game a chance on my PlayStation or my psp back in the day, so the moment I saw this on the play store i purchased it. Oh, and FFBE War of the Visions. Plz.

Not worth buying!!! Controls are horrible!! It would have helped if there was an option for the character controls outside of combat to be static. Also during battle when you have a combo going you sometimes have to select a character twice in order to get them to use their special losing valuable % during that time. Fix the controls and I'll revisit this rating.

Tried contacting Square enix, got an autoreply email asking me to contact them by clicking on a broken link. Square is a ruin of a company. They will get no more purchases from me and I will warn away anyone who will listen.
I love this Game one of my favorites of all time I'm happy that it's at a newer system I really would love it for pc for it to come out on steam or playstation network
Great game

Got ps4 controller to link to phone...for some reason it works for a bit..but after a while i cant mive my character..i can jump amd attack..but unable to move..can u offer help?.. Over all love the game..would be awesome to play with comtroller thamks!!
Great port of one of my favorite games of all time.
Enjoyed it on PS1 and enjoy it on mobile. I had an issue where I couldnt jump while running, but I switched the control from Simple to Classic and that fixed the problem.
Please remove microtransactions. I paid for the game already. How can you spoil a classic like this Square?
Extremely bad GUI and system also can't handle refund. Please trust other reviews about how bad the controls are and don't waste your cash like I did.
Thank you for porting on phones. I love this game. Please also port on switch/PS4 or continue to make a vp3

Difficult to control on a cellphone, without a d pad it makes the quick platform sections an incredible chore and there's no option to turn the sensitivity of the virtual d pad. You basically full sprint immediately with the slightest twitch. Love this game but it's a pain to play on mobile.
They converted one of the best games from the PS Era to a pay 2 skip game.

Very happy to have a port of this since I have been wanting to replay it for a while now. Unfortunately, this version does not have proper Nvidia Shield TV support which feels odd since previous Square Enix ports like FF IX have proper support and launched with it. I am hopeful that Square Enix supports this gem properly and implements support in the near future. Otherwise, port is functional without a controller using touch screen. Going to install this on my old Nvidia Shield Portable right now and see how well it works with controls. Hopefully this comes to PC and other consoles/devices as I will probably buy it there as well. Square Enix hasn't updated the game in a year and a half. I have been waiting for Nvidia Shield TV support this whole time before I played it but apparently this product was sent to die. What a waste.

I love Valkyrie Profile but the controls concerning movement make this game almost unplayable in some dungeons. Its painfully slow and unresponsive on mobile. I made it as far as Chapter 3 before I had to delete it out of frustration.

SOLUTION!! Yes the controls are HORRIBLE because of the touch screen, BUT I found a solution if you own a PS4 controller!! If you hold the ps button and share button on the controller at the same time, in a few seconds the controller will start blinking differently than usual. If u go to the Bluetooth settings on your phone, you will see that you can connect your PS4 controller to your phone!! This makes field movements and battles feel like the good ole days, but menus are still touch screen.
Relive the adventure

Don't do it just dont. Game is broken dude to it's trash controls. Go get the real game. Torrent it. Just don't put money in this... Did I mention it has micro transactions? Oh and they nerfed the exp given to try and make ya buy there exp booster... Don't buy!!!!!
Best game ever

The game is a classic, however the controls is the only thing that makes the game horrible. Square Enix needs to make an update on this game and do a better job to make the gamepad more compatible to this game. Honesty with this classic, YOU DONE MESS THIS GAME UP!!!!!
Kept restarting the app every time I tried to run.
I really HaTE touch control. Even if I use a wireless controller, it's not very responsive at all.
Controls are too finicky for my liking. Would rather emulate this myself
Great game. Looks & sounds amazing. Is there going to be support for Chrome OS?
Flawless classic

Easily one of the best games ever is totally ruined for the simple fact that it's not able to do Multi-touch on it. It's been years since I got this game and Haven't been able to get outside from the first dungeon. Not because it's hard, it just extremely annoys the hell out of me that the controls are so bad. They should've just used some mimic'd controller buttons instead.
when game lunch they crashed every time
I loved this game growing up and I love it now. I have spent hours playing this game.
my childhood is back
The touch screen controls make this wonderful game unplayable. I don't understand why it was ported to phone os over console e-shops.
this game runs horribly on my phone. it also has microtransactions which seems crazy for a ps1 port
Niebelung Valesti.... ðŸ˜Ž
Fun nostalgic rpg.
Doesn't work too well on a dual screen phone. Forced orientation is wrong.
Awesome Incredible I Love it
still waiting for the console port as the controls are painful to use on mobile, other than that still one of my top 5 rpg's and I would love to see a HD rerelease on the newer systems.
great rpg

Great game, but unplayable. I've been looking forward to finally I've tried to use playing this classic rpg. the visuals and music are great, and the story is intriguing. However, not only do I hate touch controls, but the game had essential platforming segments that can't be done with touch controls. I've tried using a gamepad, but to no avail.
A timeless classic. I could play this game a hundred times over and the updated menus and such are great!
Does not work on mate 20 X
why my evaluation points not dropping even though i did the necessary events for the good ending???
just as i remember but more convient. absolutely love it still
ill give it anotha try anatomia ia epic
love it but controls could use some lovin
classic
3 stars for lack of controller support
i got dragon slayer for ahrngrim. but after 2 period it vanished. why the hell is that? and it happend to my other precious item. please fixed it.
why you guys don't create a item or button to escape after beating the bosses. is quite hard to move around as some area with many traps
My favorite Lenneth & Lizard
Hard for control
AMAZING!!!!!
its a nostalgic flashback of one that I used to love with PS. thanks Square enix. I hope next time, we ll have FF8 in mobile.
I bought all the IAP extras, but they do not show up as purchased. I tried restoring the purchase, but they are still shown as not purchased.

The controls make this painful to play. the platforming in this game is hard, and its rendered harder by bad controls. Combat can be the same, with characters unexpectedly not doing anything, ruining combos.
it would be 5 stars if it had fixed directional buttons, cloud storage, and most inportantly it didnt drain the battery so fast. i have use emulators and they dont suck te battery dry this fast.
doesn't seem to be optimized very well. 18 bucks is too much
Amazing game redone with amazing on the go aspects. needs more controller support, some of us android gamers actually like using a controller ^_^
A jewel forgotten for a very long time.
I love this game but it will not update at all! please hell square! pleeease
just got this would like a refund not my type of game video kinda misleading

Seems enjoyable, but very poor controller support. Tried three different controllers - only a wired one worked, which is not a good choice for gaming on a phone. No ability to test or customize controls either, you just have to hook it up, go in-game, and mash buttons to see how things work. The FF4 port had good controller support, so why didn't Valkyrie Profile? Judging by others' comments on a certain section of the game being impossible with the touch controls, I have to pass on this one.
boring so far !!!!

Easily one of the best - if not the best RPG of it's era. This is a great port of a game that was very under rated for its time. With all the hand painted backgrounds, awesome voice acting, and a very great story , this game still holds up. Now Square-Enix, get off your @$$es and make part 3!
Great game, terrible port with truly archaic movement controls. This became apparent once you start to explore the dungeons.

Despite the controls for the side-scrolling elements being absolutely inexcusable, this game is SO unbelievably incredible that it outshines the one poor port decisions Square Enix made. The content in the game is all intact, with additional things you can purchase if you choose to - not a single purchasable thing adds anything to the actual game. The PSP port is better, but this is absolutely worth the money if you've never played it.

The title screen states that this is the PSP version of the title yet they removed the cut scenes and some voice files to offer them as DLC. This is unacceptable. I was also unable to receive a refund for this game despite having purchased it less than two hours ago.
nice port of an awesome rpg. hopefully you can bring Valkyrie Profile Covenant of the Plume next.

greatest game ever made. now on android. but how do I get my purchased items returned in the game since I had to replace my device? the account is the same one I purchased the game with, along with the extras except for the vid/sound collection but now they are gone from my game. I don't like that at all....30 bucks to feel gypped ain't exactly the coolest

Masterpiece ever, no doubt! However, English version dubbing not good, I feel those voices just don't suit the characters especially for Lezard, quite horrible. Wish they will put on Japanese version later, wouldn't mind with in-game purchase. The floating joystick is painful but go with a gamepad will solve everything.
No words adequately ever describe this masterpiece, originally from Tri-Ace. Likely Squaresoft's greatest. Simple intuitive controls have you whooping Nordic Ass in no time. Classic
Best game ever thank u just love it.

All time great game, but the controls (during platforming areas) seem to alternate between hyper sensitive and unresponsive. VP always had tricky platforms, but the jump button in this port is unreliable. Not game breaking, but makes hard to reach treasures a real chore. Still worth every penny.

Would be pretty good if it weren't for the fact that the mobile controls make some parts of the game unplayable because they don't register my inputs fast enough. The dark tower of Xerva is literally impossible because the app registers the input to jump so slowly that she can't make it across the three pillars in that one room before getting knocked off.
The game is everything I remembered except the on screen controls really suck. I picked up a Bluetooth controller just to play this game. It great to play it again.
Top notch

The Control scheme sucks and unfit for this type of game it's to many things at once you're doing the game originally was made for a controller and not touch screen focus on fixing the controls and my rating will go up besides the graphics look great and the story telling is cool but the controls man... they suck so I have to uninstall until this issue is took care of might make me reconsider purchasing the next game you guys bring out and what about Drake Rider you guys should remaster it and put it back out never got to try that
Gameplay is to slow. The reaction speed for the controls is slow and causes a lot of problems in the game. Just trying to move on the map is a pain.
my extra purchase on bluestack somehow does NOT link with my purchase on my smart phone

The controls on this are so terrible it's barely playable.  The game itself was one of the greatest RPG's of all time, but this port over is GARBAGE.  AGAIN, another SE game that was ported over that sucked and was barely playable!!!  There should be a lawsuit against SE for these android ports.

Although there are a few annoyances in the port, it was overall well done. I enjoyed the game even more now than I did on the playstation many years ago. I cannot in good conscious give it less than 5 stars. It does need a scene skip option and better gesture based movement controls instead of the on screen joystick though. Let this game be engraved upon your soul!
Rough controls hard to traverse the games 2D aspect of crystal jumping to opposite ends, however I love this game and I'm happy to support it! In hopes of Valkyrie Profile 3 Hrist or maybe a remake!
Valkrie Profile was the greatest and most underplayed game on the Playstation 1.
I cant download it, I've tried it many times, it still can't be downloaded.please return my money that i paid, thank you
Good, but has problems with multitouch where it won't allow you to do crucial things in certain situations, such as jumping while running
Finally a re-release after waiting for the whole of the PS3 generation for it to be added to the PSN store. Here's hoping it's on the PlayStation classic
A game that marked my childhood, wonderful
the game won't even install

One of my personal favorites. Still have a PS1 copy. I was thrilled to see it available. The touch controls are super clunky and imprecise. Navigating dungeons is a chore because of it. The additional "content" is pay-to-win garbage, marring what is a beautifully designed game. I'm not sure if they tweaked the leveling to encourage people to buy EXP and attack power, but it wouldn't surprise me. The combat is still fun, though.

The controller support is a big joke. You can't control any menus, including using items or casting magic in combat. If you change your button mapping to classic (switch select/back buttons) it will also mess up your combat buttons so you always attack with a wrong character. If you want to play with a controller, don't buy this.
My favorite game back then OMG I miss this game <3 it was an instant buy to me when I saw it here xD

I first played on the PSP. This game has been a favorite of mine for years, and replaying it has been a joy. I totally recommend this! I do think using a Bluetooth controller makes it that much better of an experience however as the on screen analog stick is honestly terrible. If it was an on screen DPAD that was static like the buttons, I think it would control much better. My only major gripe with the game is that on a Snapdragon 821 device, It shouldn't lag and be choppy. The game needs to be optimized as this is not a demanding game. Until then. I can't enjoy it on my Pixel so I need to give it 3 stars.
Very good game. Glad its been ported to the phone ðŸ˜€
I'd like it even more if the game had Japanese VA option. The game as is surprisingly has very good control for mobile, the improved graphics and menu are a nice touch.

I wish theres an option JP voice, or perhaps make that purchase-able 
feature?

Can we please get a fixed joystick. The platforming is horrible on the 
touch screen and I believe it'd benefit from the option.
So many memories

Give us full controller support I want to be able to change each button 
individually. I love this game though. Always have always will

The controls are miserable enough to destroy the experience. Don't buy 
unless you have a proper controller.

This game is pretty good. It really needed a D pad but other than that this 
game was awesome.
Keep the game more update
My Fav game with very good story

The controls are difficult, the sound goes in and out randomly, and there 
aren't any options for external controller usage. It's nowhere near ready 
for public use! Really desire a refund!!
I love the game it's very fantastic and I love both playing games begin

Download it but only got to the title screen then nothing. Now it works 
lol.........

After suffering from the frozen start screen others reported I contacted 
support. A few tips and an update later(24hrs) I'm loving this excellent 
game.

please help.. i stuck at opening cannot load anymore.. i already played 
since yesterday.. how can i solve this??

Great port! It works fine on my note 5 with no issues. There are some 
platforming sections that are difficult with the touch screen controls, but 
I made it past them with a little effort. If possible, it'd be great for an 
update to help adjust the platforming difficulties.
I have a problem . The Icons in the main menu is gone. I can't play

Game is great, but now is just stuck on loading screen and won't start the 
app using Samsung s9 can any one help?

Stuck in title screen. Doesn't do anything for me beyond asking for 
permissions. Waste of 20â‚¬, as far as I'm concerned, unless they fix that.

The touch controls are problematic for platforming (jumping around to get 
to specific areas). An option to fine tune the movement analog would help a 
lot (as in, more slide of the finger is required to get Lenneth to start 
running). The game is still good though; I use a lot of on the spot saving. 
However, my game now gets stuck at the white title screen (since July 1). 
Something from google Play automatically updated (without asking me; I have 
app auto update off in Play settings). I'm fairly certain that broke the 
game. I've contacted support from here, and from the link given in the 
automated email. (I saw 2 or 3 reviews stating the same problem, all from 
July 1 or 2). I want my save file, but I cannot root my phone :( Good port 
of the game otherwise.

Was enjoying the game just fine until today when I tried to play and the 
menu won't come up at all. Can't even say that it is frozen because the 
sparkling stuff when you press the screen is still there.

Great game all around i dont know why people keep saying the emulator is 
better because its not i have no issues useing the touch screen and not to 
mention you can hook up a controller up to it aswell i use my xbox one 
controller from time to time its great

It locks up on the white loading screen. None of the buttons for new game 
show up so I can't even play the game. There goes 18 bucks

Played it on PS1, played it again on an emulator, played it again on my 
phone, and still in love with it.
Keep getting error code 19 all the sudden â˜¹

Great port of the PSP version. Less 1 star for the borders. Update: So now 
I'm at the Seraphic Gate. I thought it'd be easier this time but nope, I 
can't save anywhere while inside like the old versions. lol I'll just 
finish it when I have a few hours to spare.
Terrible all around

One of the best RPGs of all time, though it lacks polish in some areas. The 
beginning is very slow, but picks up after that. Hint: make sure to get the 
"A" ending!

So excited that this game is back in my life :) one of my favorite games 
along with fire emblem

Classic game! I'm having difficulties with the slow controller response and 
I cannot get the items that is similar to a bag! Please fix this.

So glad it's back, would prefer an HD remaster on console but this will do, 
the controls are literally the only downside

The only thing that is really pissing me off about this game is the 
controls if we could have a D-pad and change the size, and move around the 
buttons that would be great. I love this game and I pray that we'll get 
VP3: Hrist.

Amazing until the end. Flame of Purgatory is impossible using mobile 
virtual controls. You can't beat it, but it is amazing up until then.
Love the game. But this game really needs FULL controller support. Please devs make an update for that. After update I will change my rating.

This game is a solid port. My only real knock is the touch interface for 
movement. I feel it can often be very challenging to navigate a dungeon, 
jumping and moving and the same time or climbing ladders. I cant explain 
how many times you can easily walk in and oit of entrances simply cause the 
touch interface for movement is slightly sensitive.

Experience the *best* ps1 era RPG on mobile. I've been a VP fan for years, 
and getting to play it properly on mobile is a blessing.

One of the best turn-based RPGs I've ever played! Fascinating story based 
on Norse mythology, great combo battle system, and unique platforming-based 
dungeons. I highly recommend playing with a guide since the A Ending route 
is the true experience of the game.

So great! Love the remastering and the ability for my phone to use an Xbox 
One controller with the game.

The abysmal controls near completely ruin this port. Certain platforming 
segments become exercises in extreme frustration. The core gameplay is 
great, but fighting the stages more than enemies isn't fun.
We need Valkyrie Profile 2: Silmeria as well!!!! :D

DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! I saw the positive reviews and I regret buying 
this. The controls are awful. Graphics aren't very good. Combat is slow and 
bulky. Do not buy!

Why is it portrait art in game so bad,it much worse than psx and psp 
version, i somewhat regret after bought,please update it...
Almost a decade ago the last i play valkyrie in sony psp.

Unable to play on S3. Been looking forward to this game for a long time, 
but sadly crashes upon pressing any button on the main menu.

I'm so happy this game is now on mobile, makes it alot easier to uploaded a 
lets play series of valkyrie profile onto my YouTube channel. For those who 
are curious to know how this game works and just want to watch for 
entertainment resons my YouTube channel is, Bradley kowe.

Final fantasy 8 port please. On this game y'all should change tap anywhere 
to attack instead the bottom hp.

I loved this game when it was on PS one and had this version on PSP. It 
harkens back to a time when RPGs weren't about cinematics and more about 
story with limited graphic potential. The problem with this port is the 
touch interface makes it incredibly difficult to navigate dungeons ( 
especially on ladders ) and the pre-rendered backgrounds did not translate 
well from SD to HD. If you're looking for the nostalgia it may be hard to 
capture with this port. I honestly wish I'd had researched it before the 
purchase as I feel my money would have been better spent elsewhere.
My all time favorite game. I didnt even think twice to buy this.

Amazing port. One of the best RPGs ever, beautifully ported to mobile. 
Great job Square Enix!

A solid port of the game. Controls could use some polish. Virtual joystick 
is too small and inputs get eaten during platforming sections. Even old 
emulators give the option to adjust the size of the buttons and analog 
stick.

Great game. The controls are hot garbage on mobile. If you require any 
tight controls then you can forget about getting that treasure. Please fix 
the controls!

Everything is great with this game except for randomly Lenneth will lose 
her skill setting. I always have to select First Aid for her. It seems to 
save for a while but then I look later and it's not selected anymore.
Controls need improvement.

A trip down memory lane! I've beat this game so many times and when I saw 
it coming back I knew it was time again! Great graphics, sound, and the 
great feel of nostalgia. Worth every penny!

The game will not download, i have tried several times. Please give me 
refund.

My fav game if ALL time ... sadly with this port u r better off playing 
with the emulator... The control is SO bad you cannot pass certain 
stanges!!!! The combat feel very slow and stiff (sadly and emulator for 
ppsspp or psx give you much better/faster combat flow). I still buy it and 
keep it because i want to support this game that i love so much. The story 
is touching, the depth of the battle system is great and they have really 
good music. Hopfully they will improve more of this port in the near 
future...but knowing squarenix... i think they will just milk this for 
money and move on...
game is epic as always the controls is the worst, it affects the game itself

Why used "gamepad" only available on dungeon exploration only??... Make 
available on menu and battle too (sorry my bad english)

I love that its on mobile and loved it back when i was a kid. The only 
complaint i have is that its a bit laggy on my phone. Other then that very 
great work. Hopefully i can get a response, it'd be very much appreciated

One of the best games of all time and I'm not normally a mobile person just 
love tri ace hopefully we get star ocean 1 and 2 some day too I'm sure it 
will happen

One of my favorite RPGs of all time finally ported to mobile. Price point 
is a little steep but it's totally worth it. One of the most innovative and 
cool combat systems and an engaging story with interesting characters.

One of the all Time greatest RPGs I've ever played. The soundtrack and 
voiceovers add weight to the sorrowful story and the game is packed with 
different decisions that affect the game as a whole. A true masterpiece 
that fills my heart with joy

Hmm was good but disappointed that there's no Japanese Voice over in game. 
The trailer have the Japanese voice over :(
I have love this game for a long time

Everything good, except you can't choose voice language so only English dub 
here. And controlling is bad for platforming sections.

How the h do I activate the portal. I just finished chapter 0 and when I go 
to the red portal circle the arrows move but then nothing happens. I tried 
everything. Pls help!

Well... I love the game but I reccomend to all not to purchase anything in 
game. I purchased all 3 sets of in game extras and instead of getting 
charged once per set, I got charged multiple times. About $15 dollars more 
then I should have. So... Beware.

I'm a huge square fan and sadly never got to play this back in the day on 
ps1, and the original game is quite hard for me to find and seems to always 
run for around 100 dollars on ebay so with that said I was excited to see 
an updated mobile release. The game is truly a masterpiece and runs 
flawlessly with no noticeable frame drops. The music is breathtaking and 
very well done. The storyline is very interesting and keeps you engaged and 
wanting to keep playing to unfold more. The fighting is really fun and the 
visuals are super cool. 5 stars for sure and worth the price tag! Only 
issue I had was getting used to the touch controls while platforming but 
eventually I got it down. The game does support sombre controllers/ Game 
pads though.

This game is an absolute masterpiece. If you skipped this game back in the 
day, or just never had the opportunity to play it, now is the time. The 
game is worth every single penny. The art is stunning. The music is 
phenomenal, from the same composer that has worked on some of my favorite 
series ranging from Dark Souls, to Bravely Default to the Tales series. The 
story is a memorable one, filled with loveable and relatable characters. As 
for the port, it's a solid port. I have no performance issues at all on my 
Pixel 2, the visuals have definitely been updated, particularly the 
character portraits. The controls are great, but the platforming is a bit 
difficult with the virtual joystick. Overall, I highly recommend this port. 
Also, it does work with the Android P beta.
